Welcome to MineSweep,

The default game level is beginner. The game level can be changed at anytime using the menu. To play the game you must remove all the tiles without touching a tile that contains a mine. If you touch a tile that contains a mine you loose the game. After losing the game touching the red mine icon restarts the game. 

The numbers represent the amount of surrounding tiles that contain mines. This information will provied assistance in winning the game. To win the game you must remove all the tiles that do not contain mines without touching a tile that does contain a mine. At the same time you must mark all the tiles that you believe contain a mine with a flag. Flags can be placed by long pressing a tile and removed with the same action. A long press must last longer than half a second. 

Remember the timer is running. The faster you win the game the higher ranking for your time! Also the timer will pause when a phone call interrupts game play. An ongoing game cannot be restarted until the game play is complete whether win or loose. The super smiley will also restart the game when touched. 

Good luck! "Never give up!"



Game Levels:

Beginner: 10x10, 10 bombs
Intermediate: 12x10, 20 bombs
Advanced: 13x10, 32 bombs

CRITICAL: This application reads and writes from/to a high score file on your android handset.The file can be located in your files at:

/elloMineSweep4.2

If you happen to move or delete the file: 

1. Close the MineSweep application
2. Launch the application

When the file is missing, this action will rewrite the original high score file. Be aware your previous high scores will be lost.
